title: Individualized Learning Material Supplementation Program to Improve Educational Outcomes in Low-Income Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course enhancing the capacity of in-service practitioners to design and operate supplementary programs for improving education in low-income areas, emphasizing individualized teaching strategies tailored to community characteristics and learner levels

learning_goals: Learners can design data collection and evaluation tools for analyzing educational disparities
Learners can develop personalized learning materials that incorporate regional language and cultural contexts
Learners can operate a customized feedback system based on formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
